analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#113-114) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#210-248)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#327-350)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#421-436)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#439-457)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#521-525) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#261-279):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#276-277)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#278)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#552-567) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#564-567)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#488) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#529-532)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#521-525)
	- /unique_chucks/4/0xb45893bd77830bec7c305aded041bd74f0343bd1.sol#523-525
